name: edge-viewer-web
description: TypeScript web viewer for Edge Viewer Android app

scripts.start: npm run build && node -e "const port = process.env.PORT || 3000; require('http').createServer((req, res) => { const fs = require('fs'); const path = req.url === '/' ? '/index.html' : req.url; const file = './public' + path; fs.readFile(file, (err, data) => { if (err) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('Not found'); return; } const ext = (path.split('.').pop() || '').toLowerCase(); const types = { 'html': 'text/html', 'js': 'text/javascript', 'css': 'text/css', 'png': 'image/png', 'jpg': 'image/jpeg', 'jpeg': 'image/jpeg', 'svg': 'image/svg+xml', 'map': 'application/json' }; res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': types[ext] || 'text/plain' }); res.end(data); }); }).listen(port, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:' + port));"
